name: Void Rush (Fetknoppen, lr222gw)
description:
Void rush is a game about an intergalactic game show where the participant must jump through the curse and complete a puzzle as fast as possible. The participant can use powerups spread out in the course to get an advantage. There are obstacles placed throughout the levels to make it harder, as well as a nasty ghost that chases constantly chases the participant.

This game was made as a school project by six students at BTH Karlskrona.

Github: https://github.com/lr222gw/void_rush
